summary: Accomplished developer with 8+ years of experience delivering software for clients ranging from startups to established enterprises.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Mobile/Web Developer
experience.description: Engaged a diverse set of multi-national clients of all sizes on a variety of web and mobile applications. Notable projects include:

projects.name: Kaotim
projects.client: Digital insurance platform for Malaysia's 2nd largest insurance provider
projects.description: Led mobile development of the app counterpart for Kaotim's online insurance platform while providing support for the web-based version as needed. Took initiative to establish best practices in the codebase and project workflows.

projects.name: RHB Bank
projects.client: The 4th largest financial institution in Malaysia
projects.description: Contributed to the development leading up to the launch of their new internet banking platform, while spearheading the process of refactoring legacy code to improve the site's stability and scalability. Additionally, provided consultation and mentorship for the in-house development team.

projects.name: BonusLink
projects.description: Supported the redevelopment of BonusLink's main website and e-commerce platform, which garnered a substantial rise in customer interactions post-launch. A monorepo architecture(via Turborepo) was utilized to support multiple promotional sister-sites.

projects.name: Wimyx
projects.description: Launched the first iteration of the Wimyx app, which allowed users to record and upload videos of concerts then seamlessly switch between enhanced and regular audio tracks during playback. FFMPEG was heavily leveraged for many features on this project, and a live streaming feature was prototyped as a proof-of-concept for future iterations.

projects.name: Homeboxx
projects.description: Headed the development of the Homeboxx partner mobile app, which was used to remotely control their security lockboxes. Additionally, developed backend infrastructure to facilitate OTP generation and Twilio-powered SMS triggers.

projects.name: Top Glove
projects.description: Developed a workforce management super-app, featuring location-based task distribution, voice calling, and instant messaging. The tracking system was achieved using a combination of GPS, Wi-Fi proximity, and Bluetooth beacons for precise distance measurements.

projects.name: Oslo Mikrobuldring
projects.description: Working as a full-stack developer, integrated Stripe payments with subscription-based models for their gym management app, which automates member payments and gym entries.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Deployed and maintained enterprise e-learning solutions.
highlights: Worked with many large corporations including DBS Bank, Allianz, Hartalega & Great Eastern Life.
Hosted training seminars for in-house teams of up to 30 members.

personalProjects.title: Team Q Swim
personalProjects.companyDescription: Booking management system for a local swim school
personalProjects.description: As a full-stack developer, built and deployed this booking and attendance-tracking application independently.
highlights: Utilised React Native for the front-end, and the AWS suite for the back-end, leveraging DynamoDB as the database.
Included a comprehensive user profile management CRUD with role-based access control.
Currently tailored for administrative use, with a customer facing app planned for future release.

personalProjects.title: ShapeLink
personalProjects.description: Created a mobile puzzle game, pursued as both a passion project and a hands-on learning initiative.
highlights: Developed using the Unity game engine with C# scripting, and Python for the supplementary functions.
Implemented in-app purchases and advertisements for monetization.
Published to both App Store and Google Play Store, and met with positive user reviews.
